Description: Rectangular sandstone lintel of Pairi; cornice at the top; central cartouches of Amenhotep III flanked by serekhs and other Hieroglyphic text with a representation of the deceased in an attitude of worship at either end.
Curator's comments: Published: PM I Part 1: p. 254 C. Ziegler, The Pharaohs, Venice 2002, p. 409 [57].
Bibliographic references: Hall 1925 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 7. (pl.7)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2002 8 Sept-2003 25 May, Venice, Palazzo Grassi, Les Pharaons
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
